description: This elegant external hard drive, reminiscent of a book, is the perfect solution when you're running out of hard drive capacity or need to archive some important digital documents, photos or music. It takes no more space than a paperback book. Collect two or more and they nest neatly together like volumes on a shelf.  Data transfer rate -  480 Mb/s (maximum)   Works with Windows 2000, XP, Vista and Mac OS X 10.4.8 or later   Dimensions -  Height 6.5 x Depth 5.4 x Width 2.1 (166x137x54mm)   Weight -  2.5 pounds (1.15 kg)
title: Western Digital My Book Essential 160 GB USB 2.0 Desktop External Hard Drive
